definitions.definition: To cause to move in a curve.
To make into a curl or spiral.
To assume the shape of a curl or spiral.
To take part in the sport of curling.
definitions.example: I curl at my local club every weekend.

definitions.definition: To exercise by bending the arm, wrist, or leg on the exertion against resistance, especially of the biceps.
To twist or form (the hair, etc.) into ringlets.
To deck with, or as if with, curls; to ornament.
To raise in waves or undulations; to ripple.
(hat-making) To shape (the brim of a hat) into a curve.
The action or motion of something that curls or is curled.
definitions.example: a scornful curling of the lip

definitions.definition: A winter sport where players aim and slide stones down a sheet of ice and attempt to get their color stones closest to the house (a circular target marked on the ice).
